Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine light brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Helios herm symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 134, 11. Name Karpos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0668.16.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0982)
